languages.text: "Судьба последнего отпрыска рода — стать разменной монетой в политических играх семьи. Но я не желала мириться с подобной участью и хотела сама выбирать, кем мне быть и какой стезей идти. Узнав, что {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Великий{/g} оберегает еще сотни миров у далеких звезд, я поняла, что за пределами Ифрита меня ждет множество возможностей. Нужно лишь оборвать семейные оковы и сбежать с планеты — что я и проделала давным-давно".

traits.locale_text: "Судьба последнего отпрыска рода — стать разменной монетой в политических играх семьи. Но я не желала мириться с подобной участью и хотела сама выбирать, кем мне быть и какой стезей идти. Узнав, что {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Великий{/g} оберегает еще сотни миров у далеких звезд, я поняла, что за пределами Ифрита меня ждет множество возможностей. Нужно лишь оборвать семейные оковы и сбежать с планеты — что я и проделала давным-давно".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "The youngest child is destined to become a bargaining chip in the family's political games. But I was unwilling to accept such a fate and wanted to choose what to become and which path to follow. When I learned the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} watches over hundreds of other worlds amidst distant stars, I understood there was an entire world of opportunities beyond Efreet. All I had to do was break the familial bonds tying me down and escape the planet — which I did a long time ago."
languages.original_text: "Судьба последнего отпрыска рода — стать разменной монетой в политических играх семьи. Но я не желала мириться с подобной участью и хотела сама выбирать, кем мне быть и какой стезей идти. Узнав, что {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Великий{/g} оберегает еще сотни миров у далеких звезд, я поняла, что за пределами Ифрита меня ждет множество возможностей. Нужно лишь оборвать семейные оковы и сбежать с планеты — что я и проделала давным-давно".

All I had to do was break the familial bonds and escape the planet — which I did a long time ago."

languages.text: “家族最小的孩子，注定会成为政治游戏中的筹码，但我不愿意接受这样的命运。我想做出我自己的选择，走我自己的路。当我得知，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}至高无上的神皇{/g}在遥远的星空中注视着几百个其他世界时，我突然意识到艾弗里特之外还有无数世界与无数机遇。我要做的事情，就是打破束缚我的家族纽带，逃出那颗行星——这便是我很久以前做的事情。”
languages.original_text: "The youngest child is destined to become a bargaining chip in the family's political games. But I was unwilling to accept such a fate and wanted to choose what to become and which path to follow. When I learned the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} watches over hundreds of other worlds amidst distant stars, I understood there was an entire world of opportunities beyond Efreet. All I had to do was break the familial bonds tying me down and escape the planet — which I did a long time ago."

traits.locale_text: “家族最小的孩子，注定会成为政治游戏中的筹码，但我不愿意接受这样的命运。我想做出我自己的选择，走我自己的路。当我得知，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}至高无上的神皇{/g}在遥远的星空中注视着几百个其他世界时，我突然意识到艾弗里特之外还有无数世界与无数机遇。我要做的事情，就是打破束缚我的家族纽带，逃出那颗行星——这便是我很久以前做的事情。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "The youngest child is destined to become a bargaining chip in the family's political games. But I was unwilling to accept such a fate and wanted to choose what to become and which path to follow. When I learned the Exalted One watches over hundreds of other worlds amidst distant stars, I understood there was an entire world of opportunities beyond Efreet. All I had to do was break the familial bonds tying me down and escape the planet — which I did a long time ago."

languages.text: «El hijo más joven está destinado a servir de moneda de cambio para los juegos políticos de la familia. Yo no estaba dispuesta a aceptarlo; quería decidir en qué convertirme y qué camino seguir. Cuando descubrí que el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exaltado{/g} vigila cientos de mundos entre estrellas lejanas, comprendí que había todo un universo de oportunidades fuera de Efreet. Solo tenía que romper los lazos familiares que me ataban y fugarme del planeta, y así lo hice hace mucho tiempo».
languages.original_text: "The youngest child is destined to become a bargaining chip in the family's political games. But I was unwilling to accept such a fate and wanted to choose what to become and which path to follow. When I learned the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} watches over hundreds of other worlds amidst distant stars, I understood there was an entire world of opportunities beyond Efreet. All I had to do was break the familial bonds tying me down and escape the planet — which I did a long time ago."

traits.locale_text: «El hijo más joven está destinado a servir de moneda de cambio para los juegos políticos de la familia. Yo no estaba dispuesta a aceptarlo; quería decidir en qué convertirme y qué camino seguir. Cuando descubrí que el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exaltado{/g} vigila cientos de mundos entre estrellas lejanas, comprendí que había todo un universo de oportunidades fuera de Efreet. Solo tenía que romper los lazos familiares que me ataban y fugarme del planeta, y así lo hice hace mucho tiempo».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「末っ子は一族の政治的駆け引きの材料にされる運命にあるもんさ。でも、アタシはそんな運命を受け入れたくなかったし、何になるのか、どの道を歩むのかを選びたかった。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}エグザルテッド・ワン{/g}が、遠い星々の間にある何百もの他の世界を見守っておられることを知ったとき、イフリートの外にもチャンスがあることを理解したんだ。アタシがすべきことは、自分を縛っていた家族の絆を断ち切って、この星を脱出することだった…それが、アタシがはるか昔にやったことさ」
languages.original_text: "The youngest child is destined to become a bargaining chip in the family's political games. But I was unwilling to accept such a fate and wanted to choose what to become and which path to follow. When I learned the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} watches over hundreds of other worlds amidst distant stars, I understood there was an entire world of opportunities beyond Efreet. All I had to do was break the familial bonds tying me down and escape the planet — which I did a long time ago."

traits.locale_text: 「末っ子は一族の政治的駆け引きの材料にされる運命にあるもんさ。でも、アタシはそんな運命を受け入れたくなかったし、何になるのか、どの道を歩むのかを選びたかった。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}エグザルテッド・ワン{/g}が、遠い星々の間にある何百もの他の世界を見守っておられることを知ったとき、イフリートの外にもチャンスがあることを理解したんだ。アタシがすべきことは、自分を縛っていた家族の絆を断ち切って、この星を脱出することだった…それが、アタシがはるか昔にやったことさ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Das jüngste Kind ist dazu bestimmt, zum Faustpfand in den politischen Spielen der Familie zu werden. Ich war jedoch nicht bereit, ein solches Schicksal zu akzeptieren, und wollte selbst wählen, was ich werde und welchem Pfad ich folge. Als ich erfuhr, dass der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Erhabene{/g} über einhundert andere Welten zwischen fernen Sternen wacht, wurde mir klar, dass es außerhalb von Efreet ein unendliches Meer der Gelegenheiten gibt. Ich musste lediglich die Familienbande zerschlagen, die mich festhielten, und vom Planeten fliehen. Und genau das habe ich vor langer Zeit auch getan."
languages.original_text: "The youngest child is destined to become a bargaining chip in the family's political games. But I was unwilling to accept such a fate and wanted to choose what to become and which path to follow. When I learned the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} watches over hundreds of other worlds amidst distant stars, I understood there was an entire world of opportunities beyond Efreet. All I had to do was break the familial bonds tying me down and escape the planet — which I did a long time ago."

traits.locale_text: "Das jüngste Kind ist dazu bestimmt, zum Faustpfand in den politischen Spielen der Familie zu werden. Ich war jedoch nicht bereit, ein solches Schicksal zu akzeptieren, und wollte selbst wählen, was ich werde und welchem Pfad ich folge. Als ich erfuhr, dass der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Erhabene{/g} über einhundert andere Welten zwischen fernen Sternen wacht, wurde mir klar, dass es außerhalb von Efreet ein unendliches Meer der Gelegenheiten gibt. Ich musste lediglich die Familienbande zerschlagen, die mich festhielten, und vom Planeten fliehen. Und genau das habe ich vor langer Zeit auch getan."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Le benjamin est toujours destiné à servir de monnaie d'échange dans les jeux politiques de notre famille, mais j'ai refusé d'accepter ce sort. Je voulais choisir moi-même ce que je ferais de ma vie et la voie que je suivrais. Lorsque j'ai appris que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalté{/g} veillait sur des centaines d'autres mondes parmi des étoiles lointaines, j'ai compris qu'un univers entier d'opportunités m'attendait en dehors d'Éfrit. Il me suffisait de briser les chaînes familiales qui me retenaient et de fuir la planète, ce que j'ai fait il y a bien longtemps. »
languages.original_text: "The youngest child is destined to become a bargaining chip in the family's political games. But I was unwilling to accept such a fate and wanted to choose what to become and which path to follow. When I learned the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} watches over hundreds of other worlds amidst distant stars, I understood there was an entire world of opportunities beyond Efreet. All I had to do was break the familial bonds tying me down and escape the planet — which I did a long time ago."

traits.locale_text: « Le benjamin est toujours destiné à servir de monnaie d'échange dans les jeux politiques de notre famille, mais j'ai refusé d'accepter ce sort. Je voulais choisir moi-même ce que je ferais de ma vie et la voie que je suivrais. Lorsque j'ai appris que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalté{/g} veillait sur des centaines d'autres mondes parmi des étoiles lointaines, j'ai compris qu'un univers entier d'opportunités m'attendait en dehors d'Éfrit. Il me suffisait de briser les chaînes familiales qui me retenaient et de fuir la planète, ce que j'ai fait il y a bien longtemps. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ailenin politik oyunlarında pazarlık kozu olarak kullanılmak, en küçük çocuğun kaderidir. Benimse böyle bir kaderi kabul etme niyetim yoktu. Olacağım kişiyi, takip edeceğim yolu kendim seçmek istiyordum. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Görkemli'nin{/g} uzak yıldızlardaki yüzlerce başka dünyayı da kolladığını öğrendiğimde İfrit'in ötesinde, fırsatlarla dolu koskoca bir hayat olduğunu fark ettim. Tek yapmam gereken beni olduğum yere bağlayan aile bağlarımı koparmak ve gezegenden kaçmaktı. Uzun zaman önce tam olarak bunu yaptım."
languages.original_text: "The youngest child is destined to become a bargaining chip in the family's political games. But I was unwilling to accept such a fate and wanted to choose what to become and which path to follow. When I learned the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} watches over hundreds of other worlds amidst distant stars, I understood there was an entire world of opportunities beyond Efreet. All I had to do was break the familial bonds tying me down and escape the planet — which I did a long time ago."

traits.locale_text: "Ailenin politik oyunlarında pazarlık kozu olarak kullanılmak, en küçük çocuğun kaderidir. Benimse böyle bir kaderi kabul etme niyetim yoktu ve ne olacağımı, hangi yolu takip edeceğimi kendim seçmek istiyordum. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Görkemli{/g}'nin uzak yıldızlardaki yüzlerce başka dünyayı da kolladığını öğrendiğimde Efreet'in ötesinde fırsatlarla dolu koskoca bir dünya olduğunu fark ettim. Tek yapmam gereken beni olduğum yere bağlayan aile bağlarımı koparmak ve gezegenden kaçmaktı, uzun zaman önce yaptığım şey de tam olarak buydu."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
